title: Leigh-Anne Pinnock fuels Little Mix rift rumours as band mates snub her birthday party
text:

Little Mix 's Leigh Anne Pinnock celebrated turning 28 with a girly sleepover with her best pals and her dogs.

The star gave fans a sneak insight into the party via snaps uploaded to her Instagram story.

She drenched her lavish Surrey home in purple light for a girly disco feel, and balloons covered her staircase.

She posed with a huge group of friends drinking out of red plastic cups, and some of her pals wore pink paper crowns as they beamed and pouted for the pic.

(Image: leighannepinnock/Instagram)

(Image: leighannepinnock/Instagram)

In another photo, the girls and one boy pose on the sofa on huge fluffy throws while the birthday girls sits on the floor in the middle.

The room is decorated with fairy lights, and behind them on the wall are football shirts and footballs - most likely picked by Leigh-Anne's boyfriend Andre Gray, who plays for Watford.

She wrote alongside the photos: "28 going on 18 Thank you to everyone who made me feel special and loved on my Bday! Some of you guys had me in tears with the beautiful videos you made.

(Image: leighannepinnock/Instagram)

(Image: leighannepinnock/Instagram)

"To my girlies from day 1 (with a couple missing) we’ll be having our sleepovers until we old and grey".

Her band mates Jesy Nelson , Jade Thirwall and Perrie Edwards were notably absent from the party, though Jade wished Leigh-Anne happy birthday in a series of sweet Instagram stories documenting their friendship.

Rumours have been swirling that some of the members were fighting since Perrie snubbed Jade's fancy dress birthday party for the third year in a row in 2018.

(Image: Getty Images)

But they have put on a united front recently, publicly supporting Jesy Nelson when she opened up about her battle with cruel trolls and the effect it had on her mental health.

The other girls rushed to hug Jesy when she burst into tears on stage in Milan.

As she dabbed her eyes, her three pals noticed her reaction and wrapped their arms round her in support.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Twitter)

Jesy said that following intense trolling about her weight and looks she took an overdose of pills and went to bed.

She said: "I laid in bed for ages and kept thinking, 'Let it happen,'" but she was found by her boyfriend at the time who called an ambulance.

Her bandmates also spoke of their experience in seeing vile trolls destroy Jesy's happiness.

Jade described watching Jesy turn into a "broken doll", while Leigh-Anne said the trolls "took away her passion" for music.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

After Jesy describes the moment she nearly took her life, tearful Jade says: "I remember feeling really angry at all those people.

"I wanted to just find every single person that had ever said anything horrible to her and look them in the eye and say 'look what you’ve done to this girl'.

"Every single person who said something should have been held accountable."
description: Leigh Anne Pinnock gathered her best pals together and they donned their pjs for a raucous sleepover - but where were her Little Mix band mates?
